name: UTSURO-BUNE BANDANA
description:
Utsuro-Bune (hollow ship) is a legend from 1800’s Japan that a beautiful glowing female dressed in dazzling attire was found in a mysterious floating saucer on a village shore. The craft had mysterious glyph markings which the locals were quick to copy before feeding the woman and swiftly pushing the craft back into the sea. Was it an exiled Russian concubine lost at sea, or could it be... ALIENS?

27 X 27"

100% COTTON IMPORTED
PRINTED IN PORTLAND, OR. USA

name: Giza-Orion Correlation Bandana
description:
Pyramids like those in Giza are found across the planet aligned with the constellation Orion. Is this proof of ancient cultures having a global network, being pals with aliens, or are they just star lovers? All of the above. 

Discharge printed large 27 x 27" bandana. 100% cotton. Printed in Portland, OR. Available in Black, Navy, Burgundy and Bright Red.

name: LANGUAGE OF TONGUES CHADOR (turquoise / navy)
description:
Inspired by traditional Vaishnava Harinam chadors worn in India, we searched for crafts people still using this fine art of wood block carving and printing. We worked with our crafts people to create three blocks which are used to create this design. Being hand dyed and printed, each piece has its own unique variants and character. Please take care when wearing with light colored items as some dye may still come out. Hand wash or gentle machine wash in cold water with like colors. 


This chador is in our Language of Tongues print which is sure to aid in meditation upon the Absolute Truth. 

27 x 68”

name: SAFELY JOURNEY TO ANOTHER WORLD'S WORLD
description: As you may recall we love Sun-Ra the ancient jazz master from another galaxy. This shirt is a tribute to him in his effort to save Philadelphia from it's self as "the capitol of death" in the 70's. Screen printed tee with graphic on front. 100% cotton. Tee made in U.S.A. Printed in Portland, OR. Unisex style available in Men's M & L (Over-sized Women's). Click here for to see the fit. Models are both wearing a size M.

name: Pulsar Transmission
description: A pulsar (portmanteau of pulsating star) is a highly magnetized, rotating neutron star that emits a beam of electromagnetic radiation. This shirt is based upon a transmission we received while meditating upon Pulsar PSR J1719-1438 which has a diamond planet orbiting it. Screen printed tee with graphic on front. 100% cotton. Tee made in U.S.A. Printed in Portland, OR. Unisex style available in Men's M & L (Over-sized Women's). Click here for to see the fit. Models are both wearing a size M.
